scripts.build: npx tsc --noEmit && npx parcel build ./src/background.ts ./src/Listeners/DOM/ContentScript/DOMEventRecorder.ts --no-source-maps -d dist
scripts.dbuild: npx tsc --noEmit && npx parcel build ./src/background.ts ./src/Listeners/DOM/ContentScript/DOMEventRecorder.ts --no-source-maps --no-minify -d debug --detailed-report 10
